bio: UNWA is a music onchain community in Vietnam. We support music creators & create collectors culture. We believe web3 music could make a good impact in crypto.
contributionDescription:
UNWA support onchain music artists / builders in Sound.xyz on Optimism not only in financial but also in helping them understand collectors point of view.
What we have done atm:

- Top 3 curators leader board (top 3 revenue referral in Sound) which helped artists get financial through their music products and it also brought music lovers to Web3 music projects / artists on Optimism.
- Top 3 mints driven which helped artists bring thousand tracks to fan.
- UNWA members are top1 - top 10 collectors in many web3 music projects / artists which funded artists in their journey.

We did many educational talking and shared our view in onchain music / onchain artists in not only our community but also in many communities in VN. We believe music onchain could bring a good impact to crypto space.

contributionLinks.description: Ranked 4 in curators leader board (top 3 revenue referral in Sound)
Top 3 mints driven which helped artists bring thousand tracks to fan
Our member is no1 collector of San Holo who has ~ 2mil monthly listeners
2 mems in top10 collector of Sadye who is a new young talent at Atlantic Record.
We are no1 collector of High Tropics who's a talent artist in alternative rock
We also support many other artist like TK, Rohki, Sara Phillips...

impactDescription:
- Top 3 curators leader board (top 3 revenue referral in Sound): ~ 5 ETH in total volume
- Top 3 mints driven: ~ 3200 nft music tracks for more than 50 projects / artists
- Top 6 in number of artists supporting: 53 projects / artists in Sound.
- UNWA members are top1 - top 10 collectors in many  projects / artists: Top1 San Holo, Top 5 TK, Top 7 Rohki, Top 5 Sadye, Top 1 High Tropics, Top 4 Sarah Phillips... (link below)

- We brought hundred of new people to Music Web3 on Sound. Couldnt track the exact number because many didnt mint through our ref links. But for example 30+ of them are using UNWA behind their name to show our music sharing culture (the last link below ***)

impactMetrics.description: Top 3 revenue ref all time (in ETH)
Top 6 in number of artists supporting

fundingSources.description: We havent received anything of them before.

pwCategorySuggestions: Tokenization Platforms, Web3 Community Platform, Media Production
